title: Hillary's Final Case
description: Please note this is a revised edition of the book originally published as A Narrow TrajectoryCan Hillary finally close the case of the missing young women?Can she take down one of Oxfordshireâ€™s most wanted criminals?Can she handle her new boss?Can she help one of her team get answers on his long lost sister?And will she really get married and leave her beloved boat?
author: Faith Martin
